properties.areaDesc: Sodus Bay to Mexico Bay NY
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 5 at 2:42PM EST until January 7 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Buffalo NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...West winds to 30 knots and waves 10 to 14 feet expected.

* WHERE...The nearshore waters of Lake Ontario from Sodus Bay to
Mexico Bay.

* WHEN...From 7 AM Monday to 10 AM EST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Winds and/or waves will cause hazardous conditions
that could capsize or damage small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM MONDAY TO 10 AM EST TUESDAY... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY FOR TODAY IS CANCELLED
